data.message: Without facebook we would lose touch with family and friends. Just to be able to see pictures of what everyone is doing currently is GREAT! Thank you!!

replies.message: It's our pleasure, Ann! Thanks for being part of our community. -Joe
Facebook Why are we doing this with 3 more weeks to go in the year?
I love face book-it keeps you in touch with family and friends - pictures that you love to see - and new friends - such a happy place to be !! Thank you !     ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Hello, Facebook moderator!  Please help me get my original account back.  It's important to me. PM me if you can help.
Thank you so much Facebook for been part of my world n everyone else
Facebook pls, help me get back to my original fb accnt.tnx
Without a Facebook we would use a phone to contact to each other and postal cards to say Happy birthday and with any other accasions.
Facebook, Is my private journal that I will leave for generations. It beats scrap booking and written journals. FB is amazing.

Thank you for you.  Loved the video.  Because of you, my high school class of 1966 (school closed in '72)were reunited for our 50th this past June!!  Most of us had not seen each other since graduation. It was so memorable and all due to FB.  Thank you!!😘😘

On the flip side, w/o FB we might actually look at each other and have a conversation OR CALL our family members.  Lol, just sayin', and I am as guilty as the next guy for using it way to often. Ya, I do love it!
Without facebook, we'd be able to post photos of our hobbies without fear of getting banned.
I absolutely agree on this! Thanks FB 👍
Thank you soo much Facebook I can communicate w/ my family and friends even my long lost relatives in my country
Facebook Your algorithm for the newsfeed got Trump elected. Thanks for rewarding clickbait and thanks again for screwing over the businesses that invested in you.
Funny cuz how did we all stay in touch before facebok? ...or did everyone forget

I love having Facebook in my life. I have been able to keep up with family and friends that are separated from me by sometimes thousands of miles. And all the new friends I have met from all over because of mutual interest. Thank you Facebook for giving me this opportunity to keep in touch with old and new friends and family.
